mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.query.NoColumnsAddedException
mdException.label: No Columns Added Exception
mdException.description: Thrown when a user tries to perform a query without having first added any columns.

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.query.GeoEntityNotUniqueException
mdException.label: Geo Entity Not Unique Exception
mdException.description: Thrown when a user tries to create a map with multiple instances of the same Geo Entity.

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.query.OverlapBoundsException
mdException.label: Overlap Bounds Exception
mdException.description: Thrown when a user specifies overlapping boundaries in two categories.

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.geo.NoCompatibleTypesException
mdException.label: No Compatible Types Exception
mdException.description: Thrown when a user tries to change an entity's type but there are no other compatible types available.

mdMethod.name: getNumberOfEpiWeeks
mdMethod.label: Get Epi Weeks
mdMethod.description: Returns the number of epiWeeks In this epi year

mdMethod.name: changeUniversalType
mdMethod.label: Change Universal Type
mdMethod.description: Allows a GeoEntity to have its underlying class changed.

mdParameter.name: newType
mdParameter.label: New Type
mdParameter.description: The new universal type of the entity

mdMethod.name: getCompatibleTypes
mdMethod.label: Get Compatible Types
mdMethod.description: Returns a list of types this Geo Entity can be changed to.

mdMethod.name: getAllGeoHierarchyViews
mdMethod.label: Gets all GeoHierarchyViews
mdMethod.description: Gets views to represent GeoEntity Hierarchies
